entry.title: How Far Can I Go?
entry.content:
Create a personalised map showing how far you can go for set distances of time using the Google API.

Built with Python, Shapely, and Google APIs.

entry.title: Identifying Chinese Calligraphy with Neural Nets
entry.content:
Explored neural networks and their architectures to identify Chinese calligraphy, such as convolutional neural networks, generative adversarial networks, transfer learning.

Built using TensorFlow & TensorBoard.

T-SNE algorithm projecting the modelâ€™s representation of Chinese handwriting into 3D space. Each colour is a Chinese character written by different authors.
